pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["tlpretest 是 TeX Live 在官方镜像之外发布的测试版本，详情可见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.tug.org/texlive/pretest.html","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方介绍"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在 TeX Live 官方版更新冻结期间（通常为每年 2 到 4 月），用户可以通过 tlpretest 提前获得新版本的 TeX Live 及其包含的宏包更新。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在命令行中执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"tlmgr option repository {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可永久更改镜像源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果只需要临时切换，可以用如下命令："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"tlmgr update --all --repository {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"update --all"}]," 指令可根据需要修改。"]}]]}]

meta.title: TeXLive Pretest 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
